page.title: 11School's 50th Anniversary
page.content: On Monday 17th June our school, {Skegness County Junior,}celebrated its 50th Anniversary. It was a memorable day for everyone. In the morning at 9:00 the fourth year went into the hall for a service with Rev.Adley. The parents of the children were able to visit the school and watch children taking part in activities. When it was 9:30 the third years did gymnastics in front of an audience. Shortly afterwards the fourth years sang and danced. Then they did some music on such things as xylophones,a computer/ synthesiser and percussion. After dinner the second years did a play about two bees while the first years did art and craft in their classrooms. At 2:30 the first and second years had a disco.At 3:30 the third and fourth years had a disco.So ended a fabulous day which everybody enjoyed.
